text: Dog Barbos and Unusual Cross () is a 1961 Soviet comedy movie directed by Leonid Gaidai.Знаменитую троицу Труса, Балбеса и Бывалого Леонид Гайдай придумал на чердаке отцовского дома в ИркутскеПес Барбос и необычный кросс It stars Yuri Nikulin, Georgy Vitsin, and Yevgeny Morgunov. ==Actors== *Yuri Nikulin – The Fool *Georgy Vitsin – The Coward *Yevgeny Morgunov – The Pro *Georgy Millyar – Water-bailiff (uncredited) *Leonid Gaidai – Bear in a tent (deleted scene) *Dog Bryokh – Dog Barbos == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1961 comedy movies Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Movies about dogs Category:Movies directed by Leonid Gaidai
title: Dog Barbos and Unusual Cross
